sentence.idiomatic: What's your opinion on the appreciation of the Chinese yuan?
Experts forecast that mutual funds have the most potential to go up in value.
The housing here in recent years has increased in value very quickly.
In the past few days, the conversion for the Hong Kong dollar to Chinese yuan has fallen below one to one. The Hong Kong dollar has depreciated relative to the Chinese yuan.
Antiques will never depreciate, but only some antiques will increase in value.
Participation in professional training is one good way to prevent skill depreciation.
Everybody is afraid of suffering loss. No one is willing to lose out in their dealings.
He's the kind of person that would prefer to let somebody else suffer loss rather than suffer any loss himself.
People who are too honest are likely to suffer loss.
We will provide a daily exchange rate analysis for you.
In recent times, the exchange rate of the Chinese yuan once again has become a hot topic in economic circles at home and abroad.
In the near future, the exchange rates in the money market won't vary much.
In order to show appreciation to our customers, our company launched this "point exchange" event.
When we arrive in another country we must convert money into the local currency.
Everyone needs to be careful of foreign currency exchange fraud.
You are studying international trade, you should know what international account reconciliation is.
We can provide a service to act as agent in settling Chinese yuan bond accounts.
Reconciling large quantities of trade accounts requires a large number of accounting personnel who know how to do account reconciliation.
You could say the changes to fall and winter clothing this year are embodied in these subtle designs.
We need to get to work ensuring product quality, starting from the finest points.
Small things are often neglected, but they are still important.
What method do you use to analyze foreign exchange quotations?
He is our best foreign exchange analyst here.
Over the past few years he started investing in the foreign exchange market.
The Chinese yuan has gone up really quickly this year! My American dollars have depreciated a lot!
No one stopped you from exchanging them for Chinese yuan sooner. Now you’ll have to take your losses!

Yeah, but exchange rate fluctuations are hard to predict, how could I have known? Plus, I think that these kinds of major currencies, such as the Chinese yuan and American dollar, are still relatively stable.
That makes sense. Hey, do you know the conversion for one euro to Chinese yuan now?
Roughly 10 point something. It’s gone up a lot this year.
What about the Hong Kong dollar?

It’s about the same as the Chinese yuan now. So a lot of people that go shopping in Hong Kong use a China Union Pay bank card, because it calculates according to that day’s exchange rate. This way they can avoid losses buying and selling the currency.

Yikes, these currency fluctuations really are a headache. Especially for those in foreign investment banking, slight fluctuations have a significant effect. If it were me, my heart couldn’t take that kind of pressure.
I can see you don’t have a mind for financial management. Actually, there are limitless business opportunities in this field.
